entry.title: General bitcoin users mailing list?
entry.summary: The author of the communication is asking if there is a mailing list for general users of bitcoin that is not necessarily related to development. The context suggests that the current mailing list is specifically for topics related to development. The author provides contact information including their email, PGP fingerprint and Bitmessage address. They also provide their Ricochet-IM information which is ricochet:hfddt2csxnsb2mdq.
